title: Verseify
description: Verseify is a MERN+Next.js blog app with PWA, payments, auth, likes, comments & push notifications.
keyFeatures: Built fullstack Blog app, Full-featured platform with profiles, likes, comments & AI-assisted writing
Enabled secure and robust payments system for subscriptions using Razorpay
Added full-text search (MongoDB Atlas) & PWA features for offline access
Improved site speed by 20% with optimization & service worker caching
Integrated Google OAuth & JWT for secure user authentication
